title: Connetrix Announces New Partnership with SmarterTools
text: Connetrix Announces New Partnership with SmarterTools Connetrix partners with SmarterTools to distribute their software as an authorized reseller. PLAINVIEW, NY, October 02, 2015 /24-7PressRelease/ -- Connetrix , a full service provider of Managed Hosting Services, Server Co-Location services and Managed Information Technology (IT) Services is proud to announce that they have entered into a partnership agreement with SmarterTools Inc . to distribute SmarterTools software as an authorized reseller. Under the terms of the partnership, Connetrix will resell the SmarterTools product line, including the SmarterMail mail server, SmarterStats Web log analytics and SEO software, and SmarterTrack customer service software for use either on a client's server hosted and managed in our datacenter or installed at their own facility. "Having the full SmarterTools product line available for resale allows us to quickly expand our enterprise level application offerings for our customers." said Kevin Coveney, President of Connetrix. "The SmarterTools server applications offer businesses enterprise level features, a consistent user interface across multiple products, and will allow us to provide our customers with a single point of contact for their varying needs." Additionally, for the SOHO and SMB clients not requiring a dedicated server environment, Connetrix will be offering these software packages as part of their shared application environment, thus allowing these small business accounts access to these great packages at a substantially reduced cost of entry. Connetrix will also be able to provide these customers with a migration path to a dedicated or in-house server as their needs expand. SmarterMail is a cost-effective Microsoft Exchange alternative, bringing enterprise-level functionality to businesses, ISPs, and Web hosting environments. Features include a rich Webmail interface, file storage, detailed reporting, events/notifications, throttling, email archiving, intrusion detection/prevention, advanced synchronization, out-of-the-box antispam and antivirus and optional add-ons for Exchange ActiveSync, Cyren Premium Antispam, Cyren Zero-hour Antivirus, and Message Sniffer. SmarterTrack is a powerful help desk application built for tracking, managing, and reporting on customer service and communications, including sales and support issues. Features include a ticket system, live chat, call logs, time logs, Who's On, branding and language support, cost analysis, data mining, reporting, surveys, a task management system, and a knowledge base. SmarterStats is comprehensive Web log analytics and SEO software that cost-effectively delivers relevant, accurate, and detailed website statistics to help businesses increase conversions and maximize ROI. About SmarterTools Founded in 2003, SmarterTools Inc. is an information technology management software company based in Phoenix, Arizona. SmarterTools builds a Windows mail server, customer service software, and Web log analytics and SEO software that simplify and automate the day-to-day IT operations of businesses and hosting environments in over 100 countries. Additional information about SmarterTools Inc. and the SmarterTools product line is available at the company website: www.smartertools.com . About Connetrix Connetrix is a privately owned, facilities based company with offices and datacenters located on Long Island, NY and in Manhattan, NY. Connetrix provides Managed Hosting Services (including Web and Email Hosting Services), Co-location and Server Management, Managed Data Replication and Recovery Services for onsite and cloud based recovery, Voice over IP (VOIP) solutions including IP-PBX installations and support as well as Consulting and Management services for IP Information Technology (IP/IT) Projects with extensive experience integrating multi-vendor API interfaces. Additional information about Connetrix and the products and services offered can be found at the company's web site: www.connetrix.com # # #
